info.name: User Agent Parser API
info.description:
Collection to test the User Agent Parser API built with Node.js ES7.
It extracts browser, OS, and device info from the User-Agent header.

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
